targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "state" WHERE ("entity_id" =~ /water_nozzle/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "entity_id" fill(previous)

current.text: seedship_01 + water_supply_01 + seedship_02 + seedship_03 + seedship_04 + seedship_05 + seedship_06

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES ON "home_assistant" WITH KEY = "entity_id"  WHERE "entity_id" =~ /(seedship|water_supply)/
list.label: SeedShips
list.name: SeedShips
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES ON "home_assistant" WITH KEY = "entity_id"  WHERE "entity_id" =~ /(seedship|water_supply)/

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES ON "home_assistant" WITH KEY = "entity_id"  WHERE "entity_id" =~ /^[SeedShips]/
list.label: Sensors
list.name: sensors
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES ON "home_assistant" WITH KEY = "entity_id"  WHERE "entity_id" =~ /^[SeedShips]/

list.definition: SHOW SERIES ON "home_assistant"   WHERE "domain" =~ /(switch)/ AND "entity_id" =~ /($SeedShips)/ AND $timeFilter
list.label: Switches
list.name: switches
list.query: SHOW SERIES ON "home_assistant"   WHERE "domain" =~ /(switch)/ AND "entity_id" =~ /($SeedShips)/ AND $timeFilter
